attributes.action: Festivals like eid,Diwali etc.. should have more days off. Not just one day
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair that Christians have 2 weeks off for Christmas and other religions can’t even have 2 days of. I find this racist
attributes.background: Make festivals like eid, Diwali etc... into a holiday

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see longer public holidays for certain events, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make Chinese New Year, Diwali, EID public holidays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574964
